animeDescription: I'm Makoto. My father is always busy with his business. I don't remember my mother because she died when I was a kid. I now live with my older sister. One day, new mother and younger sister join us all of a sudden! Of course, I'm happy. I masturbate hard every day like never before, but a mishap happens to me. I get involved in a traffic accident and am sent to hospital.... There, however, works my old friend as a nurse. Also, my friend is hospitalized there. Oh, I'll become friends with them using the game given from a strange salesperson....   (Source: ErogeShop)
animeStaff: [['Suginami Daifuku', ['Director', 'Storyboard', 'Key Animation', 'Character Design']], ['Yoshida Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Tsubone Kentarou', ['Editing']], ['Yoshi.Hoka', ['Music']]]
